description:
Arima Yuusa is a former http://anidb.net/t7112 [ghoul investigator] and alumni of the http://anidb.net/ch99445 [Sunlit Garden]. He served as one of http://anidb.net/ch98685 [Arima Kishou]`s personal squad until his defection at http://anidb.net/ch95846 [Cochlea]. He and his squad now serve as one of http://anidb.net/ch99076 [Kaneki Ken]`s bodyguards.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Arima Yuusa
